name: New Being Created by the Gods, Kingu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Acquiring Freedom, Ereshkigal
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters among those cards ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Fujimaru: "...I want you to fight Gorgon with me."

name: Pledge Severed, Ereshkigal
text: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 6 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. If there is a climax with [[return.gif]] in its trigger icon revealed among those cards, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hey, Fujimaru, I—

name: Absolute Tactics, Kingu
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters on your back stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Emerged Fault" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, look at the top card of your deck, choose up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: Creating an inexhaustible number of blades and firing every single one of them at you... That is the optimal way... to fight with this body.

name: Head-On Fight, Quetzalcoatl
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hard, put it into your waiting room, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power and +1 soul until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Observing the State of Battle, Kingu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters get +500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Gilgamesh, why won't you come out yet?

name: The Goddess of Revenge, Gorgon
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Enormous Size and Strength" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Coldhearted Eyes, Kingu
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Irritated Outcry, Gorgon
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: Do not call me by that name!

name: The Great Bird of the Sun, Quetzalcoatl
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to the number of other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Thrilling Fight" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Resolve to Persist, Ereshkigal
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters on your back stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Dignity of a Goddess" is in your climax area, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 3 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: If you're not going to understand me... If you're not going to commend me... Fujimaru... I will kill anyone, even you!

name: Seated in the Temple, Quetzalcoatl
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card has in its trigger icon, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Proud Warrior of the Jungle, Jaguar Warrior
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: If you don't fear these fangs, you can come right at me!

name: Imminent Threat, Gorgon
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "For the Sake of the Plan, Kingu", this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, you may return this card to your hand." (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
I'm very hungry right now.
You shall become my sacrifice while you are terrified.

name: For the Sake of the Plan, Kingu
flavorText: The meaning? I just saved your lives.

name: Frantic Retort! Ereshkigal
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I don't want to hear it from a greedy goddess blinded by jewels!

name: Act of Madness, Gorgon
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to the number of 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Of course they connect because I'm going to destroy humans.

name: Virtuous Terror, Quetzalcoatl
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, 【REST】 that character.
flavorText: Then, is that cutie over there the Master from elsewhere?

name: Terrorizing Gaze
text: If you do not have a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters, and that character gets the following 2 abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position on the stage." "【CONT】 This card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase."

name: Fierce Attack
text: Put 4 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of level 1 or higher cards among those cards. （Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)

name: Emerged Fault
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: I will end this world and you along with it!

name: Enormous Size and Strength
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: I must kill all you humans. Every single one of you must die at our hands, down to the last child. No matter how much you resist, know that it is all futile!

name: Thrilling Fight
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

name: Dignity of a Goddess
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText:
I don't even understand what the souls are saying!
Even then, I will...

name: No Buts! Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText:
I'll take that treasure in your hand as
compensation for all this!

name: King Who Leads the People, Gilgamesh
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that battle opponent into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Mind yourselves, my elite warriors!

name: Time for the Final Battle, Gilgamesh
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] When "The Will of Uruk to Continue Fighting" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent 3 times, choose 1 level 3 or lower character facing this card, and put it into your opponent's waiting room. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: This will be Uruk's last stand against Tiamat!

name: The High Priestess of Uruk, Siduri
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, put the top card of your deck into your clock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: The city of Kutha is currently part of the area under Goddess Ishtar's control.

name: Brimming with Power, Ana
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position on the stage. 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
flavorText: With this, I can...

name: Battle Where Sand Clouds Whirl, Gilgamesh
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Recollections Through Battle" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Quite convincing nonetheless!

name: Wise King's Orders, Gilgamesh
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card has in its trigger icon, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Raise the anchors!

name: All That Was Wished For, Kingu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position on the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Grand Caster, Merlin
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card or your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place)

name: Wise King Seated on the Throne, Gilgamesh
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 card named "Wise King's Holy Grail" in your hand & 【REST】 this card] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: What's wrong? You're after the Grail, aren't you? And?

name: Halving With a Single Stroke, Gilgamesh
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "The Will of Uruk to Continue Fighting" or "Belief in Her "Choice"" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "The Will of Uruk to Continue Fighting" or "Belief in Her "Choice"" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Dreamlike Existence, Merlin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: I excel at dealing with beautiful women who are hard to handle.

name: Seething Fighting Spirit, Quetzalcoatl
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Kingu!

name: Writhing in Conflict, Ishtar
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.
flavorText: I'm getting all dizzy! Okay, calm down, me. Also calm down, Ishtar-me! There possibly can't be a deal this good!

name: Time to Part, Ana
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, choose 1 character on their center stage, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and at the beginning of the encore step, your opponent places that character from their memory on any position of the stage.

name: All-Out Seriousness, Jaguar Warrior
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
But today, I'm just a tad bit serious!
You could say 6-% less tiger! Diet Jet Tiger!

name: Souvenir for the Travelers, Gilgamesh
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Wise King's Holy Grail" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Delicious Meal, Ana
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [【REST】 this card] When "She Actually Loves It?" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: This is delicious.

name: Sudden Visit, Gilgamesh
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I will personally give you your assignment this time.

name: Return of the King, Siduri
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Wise King Returned From the Underworld, Gilgamesh" get +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When your other "Wise King Returned From the Underworld, Gilgamesh" is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.

name: Wise King Returned From the Underworld, Gilgamesh
flavorText:
That was my third descent into the underworld.
How about you get used to it by now?

name: Wise King's Holy Grail
text: Put 2 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Operation Marduk Blitz
text: If you do not have a character with "Quetzalcoatl(ケツァル・コアトル)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, that character gets -6000 power until end of turn, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets -6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ughhhhhh!!

name: Awakening To...
text: Choose 1 of your characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I really am dead here!

name: The Will of Uruk to Continue Fighting
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText:
Are you saying it's impossible? That I am at my limit?
That Uruk cannot fight anymore?

name: Recollections Through Battle
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: She Actually Loves It?
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【POOL】: When this card triggers, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: This is...!

name: The Mistress of the Underworld, Ereshkigal
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Together With Bloomed Flowers in the Underworld" is in your climax area, put 2 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Goddess Who Rules Over Venus, Ishtar
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Final Battle With Mother" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, your opponent shuffles their deck, and deal 4 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: As requested, I'm going to punch through the ground beneath your feet with no mercy!!

name: Goddess-Style Contract, Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character on any position of your back stage.
flavorText: Okay, first start by kneeling and kissing the top of my foot. I'm still a Servant. I need to properly form a contract, you know!

name: Splendid Appearance, Ereshkigal
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Wait! Fujimaru?

name: Reassuring Ally, Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: You win, Ritsuka Fujimaru!

name: Bringing the Underworld Beneath Uruk! Ereshkigal
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Just a little more! Hold on for just a little more!

name: Steady Accumulation, Ereshkigal
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Since I hate Uruk, I might've been plotting something the whole time, so give me three days, and it'll be ready!

name: Firing a Shot at a God, Ishtar
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters you have.
flavorText: Leave it to me!

name: Granting Special Rights, Ereshkigal
text: 【CONT】 If you have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn." (Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either) 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I made an exception and authorized permission for you to exist and to float within the underworld.

name: Fused Consciousness, Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: I'm always going to be me no matter what.

name: Intense Mid-Air Battle, Ishtar
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Careful Aim, Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, you may choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Expectant Gaze, Ereshkigal
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Okay!

name: Great Warrior, Benkei
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Storied Hero, Ushiwakamaru" get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Mash: "I didn't realize King Gilgamesh had already summoned Servants. Such reliable allies, Senpai!"

name: Battle in the Underworld, Ereshkigal
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Final Battle With Mother" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, you may choose 1 level 0 or lower 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Haa!

name: Triumphant Expression, Ishtar
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: And the other a goddess of beauty and bounty!

name: The Spartan King, Leonidas I
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1500 power. 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, all of your other characters get +1500 power.
flavorText:
I am King Leonidas of Sparta,
a country given praise by the war god Ares!

name: Self-Reflection, Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Gifted in Warfare, Ushiwakamaru
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'll show you what a Heroic Spirit who's nothing more than a familiar can do...

name: Bribing a Goddess
text: Choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock." "Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText:
Gilgamesh: "Furthermore, she loves gems but has no luck when it comes to obtaining them. She lacks what's called the "Golden Rule.""
Mash: "Isn't that all too pitiful?"

name: Together With Bloomed Flowers in the Underworld
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText:
Because it's not as if I like who I am right now.
I just became fond of how that human chooses to exist.

name: Final Battle With Mother
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I feel bad for King Gilgamesh, but I'm going to finish her off as the master of the underworld!

name: Final Battle With Mother
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: The future will take care of itself!

name: Towards the Final Singularity, Mash
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Good morning, Senpai.

name: Trust in Her Master, Mash Kyrielight
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Belief in Her "Choice"" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Haaaah...!!

name: Shared Journey, Mash
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters in your back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.

name: Battle With a Strong Enemy, Mash
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Coordination with Comrades, Mash
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul."
flavorText: Master!

name: Special Honorary Advisor of Chaldea's Tech Division, Leonardo da Vinci
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: I thought you wouldn't run into any "living" gods. Ishtar's Spirit Origin was extremely close to the "real thing".

name: Raising Her Shield, Mash
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Attack by a Formidable Enemy, Fujimaru & Mash
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Mash(マシュ)" in its card name get the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock.

name: Resilient Heart, Romani Archaman
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Time for a fresh start!

name: Enticing Words, Fujimaru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
Your lustrous fur like that of a Demonic Boar...
Your cute, round eyes like that of a Gazer...
It is... all too beautiful!

name: Short Break, Mash
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters. 【ACT】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card."
flavorText: Then, I, Mash Kyrielight, will tell the first tale!

name: Shuddering Genius, Da Vinci
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Avenger... The one that seeks revenge because of resentment... The eighth class that should not be!

name: Supporting Comrades, Mash
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Ngh!

name: Unfortunate Reality, Da Vinci
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you level up, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavorText: Huh?

name: Rescue From a Crisis, Fou
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Return this card to your hand] When your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Sweets》 character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Fooou!

name: Loss of Observational Waves, Da Vinci & Romani
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Chaldea Support" is placed on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, put 2 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText:
Romani: "I can't sense his biological signals!"
Da Vinci: "What is going on?"

name: Integrated Offense and Defense, Mash
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Haaaa!

name: Exchange of Sarcasm, Romani
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You hadn't done anything all the way to the Seventh Singularity. What are you talking about?

name: Valiantly Breaking Through, Fujimaru Ritsuka
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Path to the Conclusion" is in your climax area, look at the top card of your deck, choose up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +2000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play event cards or "Backup" from hand."

name: Tears of Relief, Mash
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: I'm glad... I'm glad!

name: Proof of a Master, Command Seals
text: If you do not have a character with "Fujimaru(藤丸)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "You may put 1 face up card in your level face down. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room." "You may put 2 face up cards in your level face down. If you do, draw up to 3 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room." "You may put 3 face up cards in your level face down. If you do, put up to 3 cards from the top of your deck into your stock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2 soul until end of turn."

name: Entrusted Shield
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have a character with "Mash(マシュ)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】."

name: Belief in Her "Choice"
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Chaldea Support
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Romani: "Not only that, but I don't sense any signals of Demonic Beasts."
Da Vinci: "Demonic Beasts seem to be afraid to enter the city. Though we have no idea why."

name: Path to the Conclusion
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: SD Mash
text: 【CONT】 If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: SD Gilgamesh
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: SD Kingu
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: SD Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.

name: SD Ereshkigal
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 cost 1 or higher character in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on an open position of their back stage.

name: Self-Introduction, Mash & Fou
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【CONT】 Your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 by 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters."
flavorText:
Mash Kyrielight,
and this cute little one is Fou.

name: Wise King's Secret Plan, Gilgamesh
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText:
I shall teach you a much-valued secret plan.
Now go forth, my hero!

name: The Wise King of Uruk, Gilgamesh
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: The Goddess of Fertility and War, Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: So, you're guests from afar?

name: Mysterious Servant "Enkidu"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Right. This is the hope of humanity. The final and largest fortress to protect the four corners of the world... Absolute Demonic Front: Babylonia!

name: Forest of Schemes, Kingu
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: The Mage of Flowers, Merlin
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place)
flavorText: Mhmm.

name: Girl Who Shoulders a Heavy Destiny, Ana
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: The One Who Has Seen Everything, Gilgamesh
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, you may choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Know that I am capable of all things, and so, possess all knowledge. I am already aware of what you over at Chaldea are about.

name: Power of a Goddess, Ishtar
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: My special move!

name: Wise King's Ascertainment
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【POOL】: When this card triggers, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Rage-Filled Attack
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: I'll blow everything up to smithereens!

name: Time to Display Strength, Fujimaru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Time to Display Strength, Mash" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Time to Display Strength, Mash" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: So, he wants us to show our strength.

name: Firm Courage, Mash
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if you have another 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Acting Director of Chaldea, Romani
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Fujimaru, Mash... Now that both of you are here, let's start the briefing.

name: Mankind's Last Master, Fujimaru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: The Universal Genius, Da Vinci
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

name: Perfect Proof of Existence, Da Vinci
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I see. What just happened was a forced deportation caused by a bounded field.

name: Shield Maiden, Mash
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Instant Offense and Defense" is in your climax area, this card gets +2500 power and "【CONT】 Great Performance (When your opponent attacks, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage and not 【REVERSE】, your opponent frontal attacks this card instead)" until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Battle finished, Master.

name: Round Table Deployment
text: Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Chaldea》 or 《Babylonia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Deploying Round Table.

name: Instant Offense and Defense
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
